data.said: "in the future, someone else might even code a complete
data.description: Play and control audio cd's via MCI API
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The choice for the namespace is based on the fact that there is
    already a module called Win32::MCI::Basic which lets you simply fire
    MCI command strings. Since Nilson S. F. Junior (Win32::MCI::Basic)
    said: "in the future, someone else might even code a complete
    interface to the MCI API without problems related to namespace" I
    thougt Win32::MCI::CD could be a nice name. Win32::MCI::CD is (going
    te be a) module that is a complete interface to the MCI API and lets
    you play and control audio cd's, you can even control more cd
    players at the same time. No more complicated MCI strings. Hence the
    name.
